BenchMark Physical Therapy located in Homewood, AL is a leading outpatient physical therapy clinic with convenient scheduling, patient-focused care, and personalized treatment plans. We are committed to treating each patient promptly with integrity, honesty, and compassion. Visit our website for a complete list of services and treatments or to request an appointment.

Our goal is to provide you the highest quality foot care to ensure that you can continue to perform your daily activities without pain. Whether it is standing at work, exercising, or just performing your daily routine, our medical care is directed toward a rapid recovery.   We always try to provide pain relief with conservative methods such as shoe recommendations, custom made orthotics, medications, or protective devices. The majority of time these are the most effective treatments and one is able to avoid surgery.   When conservative methods are exhausted sometimes surgical intervention is necessary. If you require surgical treatment we seek to provide you complete education of your condition with realistic expectations and out comes.   Our office has the latest technology including diagnostic ultrasound. The diagnostic ultrasound allows us a greater ability to diagnose and treat multiple foot problems the same day, avoiding the need for an MRI which can delay treatment and it is much more cost effective.   If you are experiencing foot pain give use a call or request an appointment online and let us help you get back on your feet today.

Business Name: Orthopaedic Sports Medicine Clinic Of Alabama

Business Information:
Welcome To Our Practice 
Powell Orthopedics and Sports Medicine stands out as a practice that puts people first with respect, compassion, and care for each person's challenges. Board-certified orthopedic surgeon Thomas Powell, MD, welcomes patients ranging from the age of 4 throughout their retirement years at their office in Vestavia Hills, Alabama. 
The team values each person's time and understands that orthopedic injuries and conditions often require prompt medical attention. For these reasons, they offer same-day appointments and perform digital X-rays in the office. They respond within 24 hours and provide free, handicap-accessible parking on site. 
Everyone who seeks treatment at Powell Orthopedics and Sports Medicine quickly learns that Dr. Powell and the team follow a guiding principle: Listen first and then give advice. They talk with patients, take time to complete a thorough exam, and then fully explain all of the treatment options. 
As specialists in sports medicine, the team offers comprehensive care, from prevention and treatment to customized physical therapy and sport-specific rehabilitation. 
Many people receive nonsurgical treatments for arthritis, back pain, and the full scope of orthopedic problems. When a fracture, sports injury, or degenerative disease demands surgical intervention, patients benefit from Dr. Powell's skill and expertise, including his specialization in arthroscopic surgery, fracture care (both surgical and non-surgical), joint replacements, and hand surgery 
To learn about the services available at Powell Orthopedics and Sports Medicine or to schedule an appointment, call the office, or connect using the online booking feature today.

Dr. Bramlett understands he is in a service-oriented business and therefore his main interest throughout his career has been on providing quality care delivered in the most cost efficient setting. He also focuses on offering the least invasive procedure possible and making it all understandable for the patient.

Ryan T. Cordry, D.O. practices orthopedic surgery at our Princeton Medical Center location.  He specializes in conditions of the hip, knee, and shoulder.  Dr. Cordry is originally from St. Joseph, MO and completed his medical training at Kansas City University of Medicine and Biosciences, College of Osteopathic Medicine.Dr. Cordry completed his residency in orthopedic surgery at Riverside County Regional Medical Center in southern California before going on to additional fellowship training in San Diego, CA.  There he gained another year of clinical and academic experience in total joint arthroplasty and hip preservation.  He authored a textbook chapter on the subject of total hip replacements in dysplastic hips during his fellowship and helped perform hundreds of hip and knee surgeries during that year.  He fully understands the need for high-quality orthopedic care and is committed to delivering that care through an approachable bedside manner and exceptional results.Dr. Cordry has relocated to Birmingham, AL to be closer to his wife’s family.  They are happily growing their family in the Homewood community, just a few blocks from where his wife was raised.

Dr. Amit Bhandarkar M.B.B.S., M.S., M.D. is a fellowship trained, Orthopedic Spine surgeon. Dr Bhandarkar evaluates and treats a wide variety of spine ailments consistent with his comprehensive spine training. He has practiced and done fellowships in the USA, Canada, Seoul (South Korea), Maldives and India. His area of focus is minimally invasive spine surgery, and his special interests are spine related pain management and endoscopic spine surgery (the least invasive option) for lumbar disc related disorders.Pain is the most important symptom that Dr. Bhandarkar addresses on a daily basis. He is an empathetic, compassionate physician who listens closely to patients in order to help focus his efforts to locate their source of pain. Dr. Bhandarkar then confirms those pain generators with objective tests and formulates a minimally invasive plan, which is at the same time maximally effective at keeping patients pain free and functional for as long as possible.Dr. Bhandarkar has been a keen researcher and has many international publications and presentations to his credit. He is an ardent believer in evidence-based medicine, and he practices only those techniques whose results are reproducible and have been proven effective.As Dr. Bhandarkar has travelled, trained and practiced across the world, he has encountered various cultures, customs and practices. This experience, whether performing complex deformity surgery on children in New York, or learning minimally invasive endoscopic spine surgery in South Korea, has provided Dr. Bhandarkar insight into patients diverse personal backgrounds in a way that helps him relate on a very personal level.Dr. Bhandarkar is excited to bring his expertise to the Southern Illinois region, and is looking forward to the warmth and charm of the local communities. He is eager to meet those in need of his skills and provide those patients the very best experience possible.

Jones IV are orthopedic surgeons who regard minimally invasive arthroscopic surgery, orthopedic surgery, and regenerative therapies not only as their passion, but also as their calling. James V. Worthen, MDDr. James Worthen specializes in the care of sports injuries and an emphasis on knee and shoulder injuries and arthritis. He did his fellowship with Dr. James Lubowitz practicing minimally invasive knee and shoulder techniques and conducting research on cartilage restoration. Dr. Worthen's training centered around restoring function to the active individual through both nonoperative treatments & operative. His focus has been on improving knee and shoulder surgical outcomes through innovative approaches to restore function faster. He has presented papers at multiple orthopedic meetings in our state and abroad on such topics as rotator cuff surgery, total shoulder replacements, & cartilage preservation and restoration.

Adam M. Lukasiewicz, MDAdam M. Lukasiewicz, MD, MSc, is a board-eligible, fellowship-trained orthopaedic surgeon specializing in the advanced treatment of foot and ankle conditions and injury. He completed his fellowship training at the prestigious Institute for Foot and Ankle Reconstruction at Mercy Hospital in Baltimore, MD, where he received extensive training in innovative new treatments including total ankle replacement and minimally invasive foot surgery. He completed medical school and his orthopaedic residency at the Yale School of Medicine and received his Master of Science degree in Epidemiology from Imperial College London, United Kingdom.

BenchMark Physical Therapy located in Homewood, AL is a leading outpatient physical therapy clinic with convenient scheduling, patient-focused care, and personalized treatment plans. Our goal is to provide you the highest quality foot care to ensure that you can continue to perform your daily activities without pain. Whether it is standing at work, exercising, or just performing your daily routine, our medical care is directed toward a rapid recovery.   We always try to provide pain relief with conservative methods such as shoe recommendations, custom made orthotics, medications, or protective devices. The majority of time these are the most effective treatments and one is able to avoid surgery.   When conservative methods are exhausted sometimes surgical intervention is necessary. If you require surgical treatment we seek to provide you complete education of your condition with realistic expectations and out comes.   Our office has the latest technology including diagnostic ultrasound. The diagnostic ultrasound allows us a greater ability to diagnose and treat multiple foot problems the same day, avoiding the need for an MRI which can delay treatment and it is much more cost effective.   If you are experiencing foot pain give use a call or request an appointment online and let us help you get back on your feet today.

Business Name: Orthopaedic Sports Medicine Clinic Of Alabama

Business Information:
Welcome To Our Practice 
Powell Orthopedics and Sports Medicine stands out as a practice that puts people first with respect, compassion, and care for each person's challenges. Board-certified orthopedic surgeon Thomas Powell, MD, welcomes patients ranging from the age of 4 throughout their retirement years at their office in Vestavia Hills, Alabama. 
The team values each person's time and understands that orthopedic injuries and conditions often require prompt medical attention. For these reasons, they offer same-day appointments and perform digital X-rays in the office. They respond within 24 hours and provide free, handicap-accessible parking on site. 
Everyone who seeks treatment at Powell Orthopedics and Sports Medicine quickly learns that Dr. Powell and the team follow a guiding principle: Listen first and then give advice. They talk with patients, take time to complete a thorough exam, and then fully explain all of the treatment options. 
As specialists in sports medicine, the team offers comprehensive care, from prevention and treatment to customized physical therapy and sport-specific rehabilitation. 
Many people receive nonsurgical treatments for arthritis, back pain, and the full scope of orthopedic problems. When a fracture, sports injury, or degenerative disease demands surgical intervention, patients benefit from Dr. Powell's skill and expertise, including his specialization in arthroscopic surgery, fracture care (both surgical and non-surgical), joint replacements, and hand surgery 
To learn about the services available at Powell Orthopedics and Sports Medicine or to schedule an appointment, call the office, or connect using the online booking feature today.

Dr. Bramlett has been in private practice for more than 20 years and has performed more than 25,000 orthopedic specialty procedures. Dr. Bramlett understands he is in a service-oriented business and therefore his main interest throughout his career has been on providing quality care delivered in the most cost efficient setting. He also focuses on offering the least invasive procedure possible and making it all understandable for the patient.

Ryan T. Cordry, D.O. practices orthopedic surgery at our Princeton Medical Center location.  He specializes in conditions of the hip, knee, and shoulder.  Dr. Cordry is originally from St. Joseph, MO and completed his medical training at Kansas City University of Medicine and Biosciences, College of Osteopathic Medicine.Dr. Cordry completed his residency in orthopedic surgery at Riverside County Regional Medical Center in southern California before going on to additional fellowship training in San Diego, CA.  There he gained another year of clinical and academic experience in total joint arthroplasty and hip preservation.  He authored a textbook chapter on the subject of total hip replacements in dysplastic hips during his fellowship and helped perform hundreds of hip and knee surgeries during that year.  He fully understands the need for high-quality orthopedic care and is committed to delivering that care through an approachable bedside manner and exceptional results.Dr. Cordry has relocated to Birmingham, AL to be closer to his wife’s family.  They are happily growing their family in the Homewood community, just a few blocks from where his wife was raised.

Dr. Amit Bhandarkar M.B.B.S., M.S., M.D. is a fellowship trained, Orthopedic Spine surgeon. Dr Bhandarkar evaluates and treats a wide variety of spine ailments consistent with his comprehensive spine training. He has practiced and done fellowships in the USA, Canada, Seoul (South Korea), Maldives and India. His area of focus is minimally invasive spine surgery, and his special interests are spine related pain management and endoscopic spine surgery (the least invasive option) for lumbar disc related disorders.Pain is the most important symptom that Dr. Bhandarkar addresses on a daily basis. He is an empathetic, compassionate physician who listens closely to patients in order to help focus his efforts to locate their source of pain. Dr. Bhandarkar then confirms those pain generators with objective tests and formulates a minimally invasive plan, which is at the same time maximally effective at keeping patients pain free and functional for as long as possible.Dr. Bhandarkar has been a keen researcher and has many international publications and presentations to his credit. He is an ardent believer in evidence-based medicine, and he practices only those techniques whose results are reproducible and have been proven effective.As Dr. Bhandarkar has travelled, trained and practiced across the world, he has encountered various cultures, customs and practices. This experience, whether performing complex deformity surgery on children in New York, or learning minimally invasive endoscopic spine surgery in South Korea, has provided Dr. Bhandarkar insight into patients diverse personal backgrounds in a way that helps him relate on a very personal level.Dr. Bhandarkar is excited to bring his expertise to the Southern Illinois region, and is looking forward to the warmth and charm of the local communities. He is eager to meet those in need of his skills and provide those patients the very best experience possible.

Jones IV are orthopedic surgeons who regard minimally invasive arthroscopic surgery, orthopedic surgery, and regenerative therapies not only as their passion, but also as their calling. Our physicians are truly dedicated to their craft, treating people with general orthopedic conditions such as fractures, sports injuries, work-related injuries, and joint disease. James V. Worthen, MDDr. James Worthen specializes in the care of sports injuries and an emphasis on knee and shoulder injuries and arthritis. He did his fellowship with Dr. James Lubowitz practicing minimally invasive knee and shoulder techniques and conducting research on cartilage restoration. Dr. Worthen's training centered around restoring function to the active individual through both nonoperative treatments & operative. His focus has been on improving knee and shoulder surgical outcomes through innovative approaches to restore function faster. He has presented papers at multiple orthopedic meetings in our state and abroad on such topics as rotator cuff surgery, total shoulder replacements, & cartilage preservation and restoration.

Adam M. Lukasiewicz, MDAdam M. Lukasiewicz, MD, MSc, is a board-eligible, fellowship-trained orthopaedic surgeon specializing in the advanced treatment of foot and ankle conditions and injury. He completed his fellowship training at the prestigious Institute for Foot and Ankle Reconstruction at Mercy Hospital in Baltimore, MD, where he received extensive training in innovative new treatments including total ankle replacement and minimally invasive foot surgery. He completed medical school and his orthopaedic residency at the Yale School of Medicine and received his Master of Science degree in Epidemiology from Imperial College London, United Kingdom.

Ryan T. Cordry, D.O. practices orthopedic surgery at our Princeton Medical Center location.  He specializes in conditions of the hip, knee, and shoulder. Dr. Amit Bhandarkar M.B.B.S., M.S., M.D. is a fellowship trained, Orthopedic Spine surgeon. Dr Bhandarkar evaluates and treats a wide variety of spine ailments consistent with his comprehensive spine training. He has practiced and done fellowships in the USA, Canada, Seoul (South Korea), Maldives and India. His area of focus is minimally invasive spine surgery, and his special interests are spine related pain management and endoscopic spine surgery (the least invasive option) for lumbar disc related disorders.Pain is the most important symptom that Dr. Bhandarkar addresses on a daily basis. He is an empathetic, compassionate physician who listens closely to patients in order to help focus his efforts to locate their source of pain. Dr. Bhandarkar then confirms those pain generators with objective tests and formulates a minimally invasive plan, which is at the same time maximally effective at keeping patients pain free and functional for as long as possible.Dr. Bhandarkar has been a keen researcher and has many international publications and presentations to his credit. He is an ardent believer in evidence-based medicine, and he practices only those techniques whose results are reproducible and have been proven effective.As Dr. Bhandarkar has travelled, trained and practiced across the world, he has encountered various cultures, customs and practices. This experience, whether performing complex deformity surgery on children in New York, or learning minimally invasive endoscopic spine surgery in South Korea, has provided Dr. Bhandarkar insight into patients diverse personal backgrounds in a way that helps him relate on a very personal level.Dr. Bhandarkar is excited to bring his expertise to the Southern Illinois region, and is looking forward to the warmth and charm of the local communities. He is eager to meet those in need of his skills and provide those patients the very best experience possible.

Our goal is to provide you the highest quality foot care to ensure that you can continue to perform your daily activities without pain. Whether it is standing at work, exercising, or just performing your daily routine, our medical care is directed toward a rapid recovery.   We always try to provide pain relief with conservative methods such as shoe recommendations, custom made orthotics, medications, or protective devices. The majority of time these are the most effective treatments and one is able to avoid surgery.   When conservative methods are exhausted sometimes surgical intervention is necessary. If you require surgical treatment we seek to provide you complete education of your condition with realistic expectations and out comes.   Our office has the latest technology including diagnostic ultrasound. The diagnostic ultrasound allows us a greater ability to diagnose and treat multiple foot problems the same day, avoiding the need for an MRI which can delay treatment and it is much more cost effective.   If you are experiencing foot pain give use a call or request an appointment online and let us help you get back on your feet today.

Business Name: Orthopaedic Sports Medicine Clinic Of Alabama

Business Information:
Welcome To Our Practice 
Powell Orthopedics and Sports Medicine stands out as a practice that puts people first with respect, compassion, and care for each person's challenges. Board-certified orthopedic surgeon Thomas Powell, MD, welcomes patients ranging from the age of 4 throughout their retirement years at their office in Vestavia Hills, Alabama. 
The team values each person's time and understands that orthopedic injuries and conditions often require prompt medical attention. For these reasons, they offer same-day appointments and perform digital X-rays in the office. They respond within 24 hours and provide free, handicap-accessible parking on site. 
Everyone who seeks treatment at Powell Orthopedics and Sports Medicine quickly learns that Dr. Powell and the team follow a guiding principle: Listen first and then give advice. They talk with patients, take time to complete a thorough exam, and then fully explain all of the treatment options. 
As specialists in sports medicine, the team offers comprehensive care, from prevention and treatment to customized physical therapy and sport-specific rehabilitation. 
Many people receive nonsurgical treatments for arthritis, back pain, and the full scope of orthopedic problems. When a fracture, sports injury, or degenerative disease demands surgical intervention, patients benefit from Dr. Powell's skill and expertise, including his specialization in arthroscopic surgery, fracture care (both surgical and non-surgical), joint replacements, and hand surgery 
To learn about the services available at Powell Orthopedics and Sports Medicine or to schedule an appointment, call the office, or connect using the online booking feature today.

Ryan T. Cordry, D.O. practices orthopedic surgery at our Princeton Medical Center location.  He specializes in conditions of the hip, knee, and shoulder.  Dr. Cordry is originally from St. Joseph, MO and completed his medical training at Kansas City University of Medicine and Biosciences, College of Osteopathic Medicine.Dr. Cordry completed his residency in orthopedic surgery at Riverside County Regional Medical Center in southern California before going on to additional fellowship training in San Diego, CA.  There he gained another year of clinical and academic experience in total joint arthroplasty and hip preservation.  He authored a textbook chapter on the subject of total hip replacements in dysplastic hips during his fellowship and helped perform hundreds of hip and knee surgeries during that year.  He fully understands the need for high-quality orthopedic care and is committed to delivering that care through an approachable bedside manner and exceptional results.Dr. Cordry has relocated to Birmingham, AL to be closer to his wife’s family.  They are happily growing their family in the Homewood community, just a few blocks from where his wife was raised.

Dr. Amit Bhandarkar M.B.B.S., M.S., M.D. is a fellowship trained, Orthopedic Spine surgeon. Dr Bhandarkar evaluates and treats a wide variety of spine ailments consistent with his comprehensive spine training. He has practiced and done fellowships in the USA, Canada, Seoul (South Korea), Maldives and India. His area of focus is minimally invasive spine surgery, and his special interests are spine related pain management and endoscopic spine surgery (the least invasive option) for lumbar disc related disorders.Pain is the most important symptom that Dr. Bhandarkar addresses on a daily basis. He is an empathetic, compassionate physician who listens closely to patients in order to help focus his efforts to locate their source of pain. Dr. Bhandarkar then confirms those pain generators with objective tests and formulates a minimally invasive plan, which is at the same time maximally effective at keeping patients pain free and functional for as long as possible.Dr. Bhandarkar has been a keen researcher and has many international publications and presentations to his credit. He is an ardent believer in evidence-based medicine, and he practices only those techniques whose results are reproducible and have been proven effective.As Dr. Bhandarkar has travelled, trained and practiced across the world, he has encountered various cultures, customs and practices. This experience, whether performing complex deformity surgery on children in New York, or learning minimally invasive endoscopic spine surgery in South Korea, has provided Dr. Bhandarkar insight into patients diverse personal backgrounds in a way that helps him relate on a very personal level.Dr. Bhandarkar is excited to bring his expertise to the Southern Illinois region, and is looking forward to the warmth and charm of the local communities. He is eager to meet those in need of his skills and provide those patients the very best experience possible.

James V. Worthen, MDDr. James Worthen specializes in the care of sports injuries and an emphasis on knee and shoulder injuries and arthritis. His focus has been on improving knee and shoulder surgical outcomes through innovative approaches to restore function faster. He has presented papers at multiple orthopedic meetings in our state and abroad on such topics as rotator cuff surgery, total shoulder replacements, & cartilage preservation and restoration.

BenchMark Physical Therapy located in Homewood, AL is a leading outpatient physical therapy clinic with convenient scheduling, patient-focused care, and personalized treatment plans. We are committed to treating each patient promptly with integrity, honesty, and compassion. Visit our website for a complete list of services and treatments or to request an appointment.

Our goal is to provide you the highest quality foot care to ensure that you can continue to perform your daily activities without pain. Whether it is standing at work, exercising, or just performing your daily routine, our medical care is directed toward a rapid recovery.   We always try to provide pain relief with conservative methods such as shoe recommendations, custom made orthotics, medications, or protective devices. The majority of time these are the most effective treatments and one is able to avoid surgery.   When conservative methods are exhausted sometimes surgical intervention is necessary. If you require surgical treatment we seek to provide you complete education of your condition with realistic expectations and out comes.   Our office has the latest technology including diagnostic ultrasound. The diagnostic ultrasound allows us a greater ability to diagnose and treat multiple foot problems the same day, avoiding the need for an MRI which can delay treatment and it is much more cost effective.   If you are experiencing foot pain give use a call or request an appointment online and let us help you get back on your feet today.

Business Name: Orthopaedic Sports Medicine Clinic Of Alabama

Business Information:
Welcome To Our Practice 
Powell Orthopedics and Sports Medicine stands out as a practice that puts people first with respect, compassion, and care for each person's challenges. Board-certified orthopedic surgeon Thomas Powell, MD, welcomes patients ranging from the age of 4 throughout their retirement years at their office in Vestavia Hills, Alabama. 
The team values each person's time and understands that orthopedic injuries and conditions often require prompt medical attention. For these reasons, they offer same-day appointments and perform digital X-rays in the office. They respond within 24 hours and provide free, handicap-accessible parking on site. 
Everyone who seeks treatment at Powell Orthopedics and Sports Medicine quickly learns that Dr. Powell and the team follow a guiding principle: Listen first and then give advice. They talk with patients, take time to complete a thorough exam, and then fully explain all of the treatment options. 
As specialists in sports medicine, the team offers comprehensive care, from prevention and treatment to customized physical therapy and sport-specific rehabilitation. 
Many people receive nonsurgical treatments for arthritis, back pain, and the full scope of orthopedic problems. When a fracture, sports injury, or degenerative disease demands surgical intervention, patients benefit from Dr. Powell's skill and expertise, including his specialization in arthroscopic surgery, fracture care (both surgical and non-surgical), joint replacements, and hand surgery 
To learn about the services available at Powell Orthopedics and Sports Medicine or to schedule an appointment, call the office, or connect using the online booking feature today.

Ryan T. Cordry, D.O. practices orthopedic surgery at our Princeton Medical Center location.  He specializes in conditions of the hip, knee, and shoulder.  Dr. Cordry is originally from St. Joseph, MO and completed his medical training at Kansas City University of Medicine and Biosciences, College of Osteopathic Medicine.Dr. Cordry completed his residency in orthopedic surgery at Riverside County Regional Medical Center in southern California before going on to additional fellowship training in San Diego, CA.  There he gained another year of clinical and academic experience in total joint arthroplasty and hip preservation.  He authored a textbook chapter on the subject of total hip replacements in dysplastic hips during his fellowship and helped perform hundreds of hip and knee surgeries during that year.  He fully understands the need for high-quality orthopedic care and is committed to delivering that care through an approachable bedside manner and exceptional results.Dr. Cordry has relocated to Birmingham, AL to be closer to his wife’s family.  They are happily growing their family in the Homewood community, just a few blocks from where his wife was raised.

Dr. Amit Bhandarkar M.B.B.S., M.S., M.D. is a fellowship trained, Orthopedic Spine surgeon. Dr Bhandarkar evaluates and treats a wide variety of spine ailments consistent with his comprehensive spine training. He has practiced and done fellowships in the USA, Canada, Seoul (South Korea), Maldives and India. His area of focus is minimally invasive spine surgery, and his special interests are spine related pain management and endoscopic spine surgery (the least invasive option) for lumbar disc related disorders.Pain is the most important symptom that Dr. Bhandarkar addresses on a daily basis. He is an empathetic, compassionate physician who listens closely to patients in order to help focus his efforts to locate their source of pain. Dr. Bhandarkar then confirms those pain generators with objective tests and formulates a minimally invasive plan, which is at the same time maximally effective at keeping patients pain free and functional for as long as possible.Dr. Bhandarkar has been a keen researcher and has many international publications and presentations to his credit. He is an ardent believer in evidence-based medicine, and he practices only those techniques whose results are reproducible and have been proven effective.As Dr. Bhandarkar has travelled, trained and practiced across the world, he has encountered various cultures, customs and practices. This experience, whether performing complex deformity surgery on children in New York, or learning minimally invasive endoscopic spine surgery in South Korea, has provided Dr. Bhandarkar insight into patients diverse personal backgrounds in a way that helps him relate on a very personal level.Dr. Bhandarkar is excited to bring his expertise to the Southern Illinois region, and is looking forward to the warmth and charm of the local communities. He is eager to meet those in need of his skills and provide those patients the very best experience possible.

Business Name: Southlake Orthopaedics Sports Medicine & Spine Center PC
Business Information: Dr. Thomas E. Powell, Dr. Dewey H. Jones III, and Dr. Dewey H. Jones IV are orthopedic surgeons who regard minimally invasive arthroscopic surgery, orthopedic surgery, and regenerative therapies not only as their passion, but also as their calling. Our doctors offer compassionate orthopedic care and spend ample time listening to their patients to develop customized surgical and non-surgical solutions for relieving pain, stiffness, swelling, and movement limitations. Our physicians are truly dedicated to their craft, treating people with general orthopedic conditions such as fractures, sports injuries, work-related injuries, and joint disease. In addition to performing arthroscopy, joint replacement surgery, and general orthopedic surgery, our surgeons perform surgery for the foot, ankle, hip, knee, shoulder, elbow, and wrist. Some of our physicians also administer ultrasound-guided medication injections to help relieve joint pain.

James V. Worthen, MDDr. James Worthen specializes in the care of sports injuries and an emphasis on knee and shoulder injuries and arthritis. He did his fellowship with Dr. James Lubowitz practicing minimally invasive knee and shoulder techniques and conducting research on cartilage restoration. Dr. Worthen's training centered around restoring function to the active individual through both nonoperative treatments & operative. His focus has been on improving knee and shoulder surgical outcomes through innovative approaches to restore function faster. He has presented papers at multiple orthopedic meetings in our state and abroad on such topics as rotator cuff surgery, total shoulder replacements, & cartilage preservation and restoration.

Adam M. Lukasiewicz, MDAdam M. Lukasiewicz, MD, MSc, is a board-eligible, fellowship-trained orthopaedic surgeon specializing in the advanced treatment of foot and ankle conditions and injury. He completed medical school and his orthopaedic residency at the Yale School of Medicine and received his Master of Science degree in Epidemiology from Imperial College London, United Kingdom.

Business Name: James "Rusty" Bowman, III, MD, PhD - St. Vincent's Orthopedics
Business Information: Dr Bowman is a board-certified, fellowship-trained Arthroplasty Surgeon who specializes in the treatment of hip and knee arthritis. He offers both non-operative and operative treatment of the hip and knee and focuses on primary hip and knee arthroplasty. He is particularly interested in the anterior approach total hip arthroplasty. Dr. Bowman also treats patients with existing joint replacements with revision knee and hip reconstruction.Dr Bowman is dual doctoral trained, having both an MD as well as a PhD, from Virginia Commonwealth University; Medical College of Virginia. His doctoral work focused on the biology of cell adhesion while collaborative work in tissue engineering has led to the development of a novel hemostatic bandage.

TherapySouth is a therapist-owned, outpatient physical therapy practice that specializes in personalized, hands on care. Our primary goal is to help you return to all you normal activities and prevent future injuries from occurring. We promise to listen to you, communicate with you, and provide you with the tools you need to get better, and stay better. We are excited about working with you and look forward to the opportunity to provide you with the highest quality care. BenchMark Physical Therapy located in Homewood, AL is a leading outpatient physical therapy clinic with convenient scheduling, patient-focused care, and personalized treatment plans. We are committed to treating each patient promptly with integrity, honesty, and compassion. Visit our website for a complete list of services and treatments or to request an appointment.

Our goal is to provide you the highest quality foot care to ensure that you can continue to perform your daily activities without pain. Whether it is standing at work, exercising, or just performing your daily routine, our medical care is directed toward a rapid recovery.   We always try to provide pain relief with conservative methods such as shoe recommendations, custom made orthotics, medications, or protective devices. The majority of time these are the most effective treatments and one is able to avoid surgery.   When conservative methods are exhausted sometimes surgical intervention is necessary. If you require surgical treatment we seek to provide you complete education of your condition with realistic expectations and out comes.   Our office has the latest technology including diagnostic ultrasound. The diagnostic ultrasound allows us a greater ability to diagnose and treat multiple foot problems the same day, avoiding the need for an MRI which can delay treatment and it is much more cost effective.   If you are experiencing foot pain give use a call or request an appointment online and let us help you get back on your feet today.

Business Name: Orthopaedic Sports Medicine Clinic Of Alabama

Business Information:
Welcome To Our Practice 
Powell Orthopedics and Sports Medicine stands out as a practice that puts people first with respect, compassion, and care for each person's challenges. Board-certified orthopedic surgeon Thomas Powell, MD, welcomes patients ranging from the age of 4 throughout their retirement years at their office in Vestavia Hills, Alabama. 
The team values each person's time and understands that orthopedic injuries and conditions often require prompt medical attention. For these reasons, they offer same-day appointments and perform digital X-rays in the office. They respond within 24 hours and provide free, handicap-accessible parking on site. 
Everyone who seeks treatment at Powell Orthopedics and Sports Medicine quickly learns that Dr. Powell and the team follow a guiding principle: Listen first and then give advice. They talk with patients, take time to complete a thorough exam, and then fully explain all of the treatment options. 
As specialists in sports medicine, the team offers comprehensive care, from prevention and treatment to customized physical therapy and sport-specific rehabilitation. 
Many people receive nonsurgical treatments for arthritis, back pain, and the full scope of orthopedic problems. When a fracture, sports injury, or degenerative disease demands surgical intervention, patients benefit from Dr. Powell's skill and expertise, including his specialization in arthroscopic surgery, fracture care (both surgical and non-surgical), joint replacements, and hand surgery 
To learn about the services available at Powell Orthopedics and Sports Medicine or to schedule an appointment, call the office, or connect using the online booking feature today.
